rationale: The agent modified completely wrong files. The task required fixing inverted null-check logic in Rate*GroupingAggregatorFunction.java files (changing 'if (valueBlock.isNull(valuePosition) == false)' to 'if (valueBlock.isNull(valuePosition))') across 4 files plus updating RateTests.java. Instead, the agent modified TimeSeriesRateAggregator.java, which is unrelated to the bug described. The ground truth changes 4 generated aggregator functions and 1 template file, plus adds null handling to tests. The agent's changes add null checking via advanceExact() in a completely different class that has nothing to do with the inverted logic bug. This is a complete miss - wrong files, wrong bug, wrong fix. Zero overlap with required changes.
